Uses of Interface
harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib.ISetFactory

  • Uses of ISetFactory in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib

    Classes in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib that implement ISetFactory 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  TAbstractSetFactory
    Abstract class providing standard, basic implementation of common methods for the ISetFactory interface.
    class  TProgressiveSetFactory
    This class implements an heuristic algorithm that generate list of series aiming to reduce (i.e. equalize) equal numbers between each couple of cards and equal numbers between couple of single rows of the cards. Technically, generated series are added to the list only if they do not have more equal numbers by card or by row of chosen thresholds if compared to all the cards already inserted in the list.
    class  TSimpleSetFactory
    TSimpleSetFactory object implements the simplest heuristic to generate series of cards. It simply generates a series of six cards at a time, without any "quality" check regarding the distribution of the numbers between the cards of different series. MaxEPC and MAxEPR values are not used, that is they can be considered as always set, respectively, to 15 and 5.
    Methods in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib that return ISetFactory 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static ISetFactory TUtils.getSetFactoryByType​(java.lang.String factoryType)
    Return an ISetFactory interface implementing object providing the list of series of card generation algorithm indicated by the name in input. Available algorithms are listed within the TUtils.AVAILABLE_GENERATION_METHODS public array.
